description: 30 minute train ride into NYC,   20 minutes to Williamsburg, Highland Park, Houdini Kitchen Laboratory, Bushwick Coffee House, Myrtle Avenue shopping district, Nowadays outdoor bar, close to 3 local Brooklyn breweries. You’ll love my place because it is a cozy studio in a great neighborhood, comfy bed, private bathroom and kitchen, microwave, coffee machine, refrigerator, pots pans and utensils included, access to a small backyard. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families.
name: Peaceful Getaway, minutes from NYC attractions!
review: Close to the subway. Quiet neighborhood. Convenient kitchen with almost all amenities. Friendly host. Highly recommend!
